'''''Initial Facts''''' is a [[World Quest]] in the [[Institute of Natural Philosophy]], [[The Narzissenkreuz Ordo]] [[Fontaine]].

==Steps==
# Find clues regarding the Narzissenkreuz Ordo
# Go to the Narzissenkreuz Ordo
# Organize clues at the Narzissenkreuz Ordo

==Gameplay Notes==
* Requires the completion of [[Aqueous Tidemarks]] to access [[The Narzissenkreuz Ordo]].
* Step 1 is skipped if the player has already previously entered the Narzissenkreuz Ordo.
* Step 3 is completed by finishing the following quests: [[Unfinished Story]], [[The Final Question]], and [[Riddles Awaiting Answers]].
